name: website-time-manager
description: A Chrome extension that helps manage and limit time spent on distracting websites

scripts.build: npm run build:ts && npm run build:css
scripts.test: echo 'Testing requires loading extension in browser'
scripts.package: npm run build:prod && zip -r website-time-manager.zip dist icons manifest.json -x '*.git*' 'node_modules/*' '*.DS_Store' 'src/*' 'tsconfig.json' 'tailwind.config.js' 'package.json' 'yarn.lock' 'package-lock.json'

author: Website Time Manager Team
